# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner equipment before using them
### Errors when using inserter without source items
-  Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to use it
### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
-  Make sure the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engine without connection to electricity network
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to the electricity network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
-  Make sure the pipe group has fluid before attempting to use it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent found in the logs.
No important variables assigned found in the logs.
